**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 245 4.0 You can trick and mislead others using disguises, lies, and other forms of subterfuge. Item Bonuses for Deception
Item Bonus Level Category Consumable Note
[Harrow Mat](/Equipment.aspx?ID=825) +1 0 [Adventuring Gear](/equipment/adventuring-gear) No Deception to convince a creature that a harrow reading was accurate.
[Eyecatcher](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2452) +1 1 [Adjustments](/equipment/adjustments) No Deception checks to Feint while using a weapon with an eyecatcher attached
[Glamorous Buckler](/Equipment.aspx?ID=734) +1 2 [Specific Shields](/equipment/shields/specific-shields) No Deception checks to Feint
[Quick Wig](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1321) +1 2 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception check to Impersonate to go unrecognized by changing your hair
[Disguise Kit (Elite)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19) +1 3 [Adventuring Gear](/equipment/adventuring-gear) No Deception checks to Impersonate someone
[Ventriloquist's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=468) +1 3 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Secret-Keeper's Mask (Blackfingers)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=914) +1 3 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Lie
[Secret-Keeper's Mask (Reaper of Reputation)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=914) +1 3 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Lie
[Fortune's Favor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2406) +1 3 [Relic Seeds](/equipment/relics/relic-seeds) No Deception checks to Feint
[Trickster's Mandolin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2271) +1 4 [Coda](/equipment/staves/coda) No while playing the mandolin
[Secret-Keeper's Mask (Gray Master)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=914) +1 5 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Lie
[Clandestine Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=423) +1 6 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Impersonate a forgettable background character, such as a servant
[Secret-Keeper's Mask (Father Skinsaw)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=914) +1 6 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Lie
[Unmemorable Mantle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=513) +1 7 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual
[Venomed Tongue](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1810) +1 7 [Tattoos](/equipment/tattoos) No
[Sinister Knight](/Equipment.aspx?ID=518) +1 8 [Armor Property Runes](/equipment/runes/armor-property-runes) No
[Trickster's Mandolin (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2271) +1 8 [Coda](/equipment/staves/coda) No while playing the mandolin
[Razmiri Wayfinder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=470) +1 10 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Lie or Impersonate
[Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=101) +1 1 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Impossible Cake](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1312) +2 3 [Alchemical Tools](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-tools) No Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.
[Merchant's Guile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=477) +2 5 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks, but only if the associated checks involve haggling or bargaining over a purchase or trade
[Ventriloquist's Ring (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=468) +2 9 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Unmemorable Mantle (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=513) +2 9 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual
[Taleteller's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1648) +2 9 [Cursed Items](/equipment/cursed-items) No Deception checks to Lie and Deception DCs against Sense Motive
[Cape of the Mountebank](/Equipment.aspx?ID=419) +2 10 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Clandestine Cloak (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=423) +2 10 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Impersonate a forgettable background character, such as a servant
[Ring of Lies](/Equipment.aspx?ID=456) +2 10 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Splendid Floodlight](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1785) +2 12 [Held Items](/equipment/held-items) No Charisma-based skill checks while within the red light
[Trickster's Mandolin (Major)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2271) +2 12 [Coda](/equipment/staves/coda) No while playing the mandolin
[Aeon Stone (Amber Sphere)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=407) +2 16 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Impersonate yourself as a living creature (undead only)
[Circlet of Persuasion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=400) +2 17 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Mask of Allure](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1066) +2 18 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[The Locksmith](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2482) +2 20 [The Deck of Destiny](/equipment/artifacts/the-deck-of-destiny) No Deception checks to Lie (+3 at 17th level)
[The Theater](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2490) +2 20 [The Deck of Destiny](/equipment/artifacts/the-deck-of-destiny) No Deception checks for initiative (+3 at 17th level)
[The Liar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2481) +2 20 [The Deck of Destiny](/equipment/artifacts/the-deck-of-destiny) No Deception checks to Lie (+3 at 17th level)
[The Snakebite](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2489) +2 20 [The Deck of Destiny](/equipment/artifacts/the-deck-of-destiny) No Deception checks for initiative (+3 at 17th level)
[Fake Blood Pack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1395) +2 0 [Adventuring Gear](/equipment/adventuring-gear) Yes When faking an injury, the blood pack grants a +2 item bonus to relevant Deception checks, such as to Lie about being injured
[Silvertongue Mutagen (Moderate)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=101) +2 3 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Impossible Cake (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1312) +3 9 [Alchemical Tools](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-tools) No Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.
[Unmemorable Mantle (Major)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=513) +3 17 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual
[Cape of the Open Sky](/Equipment.aspx?ID=948) +3 18 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Checks to Lie
[Whisper of the First Lie](/Equipment.aspx?ID=471) +3 20 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Silvertongue Mutagen (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=101) +3 11 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Impossible Cake (Major)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1312) +4 17 [Alchemical Tools](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-tools) No Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.
[Silvertongue Mutagen (Major)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=101) +4 17 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
